subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The infighting between the top American female players Serena Williams and Sloane Stephens over the last few months served as a backdrop to Williams’s dominant 6-4, 6-1 victory.
snippet: The infighting between the top American female players Serena Williams and Sloane Stephens over the last few months served as a backdrop to Williams’s dominant 6-4, 6-1 victory.
